column2: deliver the text of tweets from anyone i follow via email
when the room 's humidity falls below NUMBER_0 in the room play something on my speaker
column3: monitor ( @thermostat . get_humidity ( ) ) filter value <= NUMBER_0 => @org.thingpedia.bluetooth.speaker.a2dp . play_music ( ) ;

column2: please post the live feed photo of my new security camera on twitter and caption it person and i hope you have a great day
column3: monitor ( @security-camera . current_event ( ) ) => @com.twitter . post_picture ( caption = " person and i hope you have a great day " , picture_url = picture_url ) ;

column2: once it stops snowing in LOCATION_0 , get the steps from fitbit
column3: monitor ( @org.thingpedia.weather . current ( location = LOCATION_0 ) ) filter ! ( status == enum snowy ) => @com.fitbit . getsteps ( ) ;

column2: reset my thermostat reading if i get a tweet
notify me of the instagram pictures with filter brannan when there is a new article in the world section of the washington post
column3: monitor ( @com.washingtonpost . get_article ( section = enum world ) ) => @com.instagram . get_pictures ( ) filter filter == null ^^com.instagram:filter ( " brannan " ) ;

column2: retrieve my current location when it stops snowing in work
column3: monitor ( @org.thingpedia.weather . current ( location = $location . work ) ) filter ! ( status == enum snowy ) => @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.phone . get_gps ( ) ;

column2: show me my icalendar events when zackeriah uploads a new picture on tumblr
change my thermostat to NUMBER_0 degrees when someone i follow makes a tweet
column3: monitor ( @com.twitter . home_timeline ( ) ) => @thermostat . set_target_temperature ( value = NUMBER_0 F ) ;

column2: tell me the direct message i got on twitter when an event organized by jouanna mills from my calendar is about to start
column3: monitor ( @org.thingpedia.icalendar . list_events ( ) filter organizer == " jouanna mills " ) filter status == enum started => @com.twitter . direct_messages ( ) ;
